hero.title: Autonomous Intelligent
hero.contents: We are dedicated to achieving state-of-the-art performance in AI by unifying visual perception, language understanding, and autonomous decision-making.

cta.title: Always Open to New Researchers
cta.contents: Our lab is always open to prospective students (M.S. / Ph.D.) who possess a deep passion for AI research. We welcome anyone ready to acquire new knowledge and take on challenges.
